photos.caption: Clutch Fork with Bearing in KPF Transmission
Replacing KPF with original HGR transmission; not same size
Wear after 75,000 miles with replacement KPF transmission

parts.name: Clutch Plate and Cover
parts.description: For HGR/KPF transmission, includes: cover assembly, clutch disc, release bearing, Pilot bearing/bushing, alignment tool

parts.name: Moly
parts.description: Liqui Moly 2003 Mos2 100ml, Made in Germany, for bell housing and other high heat applications

parts.name: Flange Bolt
parts.description: connects flange to drive shafts, replace every time

parts.name: Manual Transmission Fluid
parts.description: ACDelco 10-4006 Synchromesh (1 quart), for transmission with brass synchronizers

parts.name: Flywheel Bolts
parts.description: Measurements: M10x1x22.3, Required (9) bolts, Recommended to replace with Loctite every time

parts.name: Upper Joining Bolts (engine to transmission)
parts.description: 12mm x 1.5 x 70mm Full-Thread w/ Shoulder Flange, replace every time

parts.name: Upper Joining Bolts (engine to transmission)
parts.description: 14mm x 1.5 x 65mm Full-Thread w/ Shoulder Flange, Replacement for stripped tap, retapped to next size up @ 14mm

parts.name: Lower Joining Bolts (engine to transmission) (2)
parts.partnum: N90597005 (need to check fitment when package arrives)
